Reviews.Title: “Good experience with Marriott”
Reviews.Author: adventurer21
Reviews.Content: For a Courtyard, this is an excellent one. We were given a room on the top floor which was very quiet. The hotel is located in a very quiet location - next to the huge Dolphin Mall. We were taking a cruise from Miami the next day and found this a very suitable location - away from the major highways and with free parking. We had Breakfast from the buffet which was excellent value for $ 12.95 complete. Would choose this location again.

Reviews.Title: “Again a nice experience at Courtyard”
Reviews.Author: memberCuracao
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that the service of this hotel is outstanding, thanks again to Erin at the frontdesk who was very serviceminded (thanks for the cookies) and another gentleman who worked as a waiter in the breakfast area they made our stay pleasurable. If you didn't know they have a shuttle bus that drives you to nearby areas too. We stayed in februari.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service all around.”
Reviews.Author: Kwturtle
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at this hotel 20+ times. We are from Key West and when we come to Miami it's normally to shop. So the location is perfect for us. Parking can be tough in the afternoon with the mall being right next door. However the service can't be beat. I had called 5 times to confirm we had a balcony room but during check-in found that our reservation was changed to a regular room. But with Albert from te front desk's help we got what we wanted. Housekeeping is prompt to bring you what you need, check-in is always flawless and there breakfast is simple but hits the spot. However on our last stay my wife who is 6 months pregnant wanted cereal at 12:30 am. And Albert again answered the need by going into the kitchen and tracking me down a couple packages and some milk. Made her happy and me not have to drive around Miami at midnight which let me get some sleep. Excellent guy with great service. We will be back for stay 21, highly reccomend.

Reviews.Title: “Defeat Snatched from Victory's Jaws”
Reviews.Author: Usquevagh
Reviews.Content: Three nights at this hotel were marred on the last day by a hasty departure: more on that shortly. This hotel is adjacent to the Dolphin Mall and a number restaurants are located nearby and in the mall itself (P.F. Changs was pretty good). The rooms are spacious and clean--as one would expect from Marriott. The front desk staff were friendly and welcoming. Shower (with tub) was clean and hot water plentiful. So far so good--the problem with the hotel is in the details. There was no fridge in the room, and though there was a coffee maker, the hotel staff left only decaffeinated coffee, not the real stuff. There were complimentary coffee pots in the hotel lobby, but no coffee was available, at least on morning of departure. Breakfast in the hotel restaurant was buffet style, but, again, no attention to details: there was no whole milk available, no chef at the eggs/omelette station, and to get refills on tea and coffee you had to chase the wait staff down. The main reason we rate this in the "not-to-be-repeated" category, though, is that on the morning of departure the in-room smoke alarm went off for no reason and, despite calls to front desk, no one showed up to shut it off after twenty minutes, at which time we could stand it no longer and beat a hasty (coffee-less) departure with the sound of the smoke alarm still ringing in our ears. We will stay at Marriotts again--we know they can do better, but we won't be staying at this one.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent assistance for wheelchair customer”
Reviews.Author: loiterer
Reviews.Content: We had used this hotel before and chose to use it again for both pre and post cruise stays due to its proximity to the Dolphin Mall with its shops and restaurants. Often the cruise companies book you into more luxury hotels which are lovely but do not have shops and restaurants nearby and as you usually do not have a car for such a short stay we find this hotel is a much better option. My husband uses a wheelchair as he cannot walk any distance and nothing was too much trouble for the reception staff to make his stay as easy and pleasant as possible. They gave us a disabled room and made sure that it was as near as possible to the lifts. Crystal in particular offered to take us and collect us from the mall in the hotel shuttle so I had less distance to push the wheelchair which was a great help. They stored the luggage for us when we had to check out a couple of hours before leaving for the port and the airport and prebooked a suitable taxi vehicle for us which could take us, the luggage and the wheelchair which was greatly appreciated. On returning after the cruise we were very pleasantly surprised to find that we could check into the room early. The free screens in reception were great as we could check in on-line for our flight and I found that when I explained to the teenagers who were using them that all I needed to do was to check in they offered to come off line for a few minutes for me which was appreciated. The rooms are large, clean and comfortable and although there can be some airport noise it did not bother us at all. We appreciated the free coffee on offer in reception and once when it had run out the reception staff brought us cups of coffee from the kitchen. We find that the breakfasts are fine and the waiting staff pleasant and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Good courtyard hotel overall”
Reviews.Author: barttrips
Reviews.Content: The rooms were comfortable and I appreciated the microwave and the fridge in the "balcony" rooms. (The non balcony rooms do not have a microwave or fridge). The beds were comfortable and a little bigger than a standard Marriott bed. There was a fair amount of noise (kids screaming up and down the hall) right around 10 pm but generally quiet. The staff didn't seem to care too much if there was noise though

Reviews.Title: “....a good choice...”
Reviews.Author: brunello097
Reviews.Content: ....if you are trying to combine, comfort, location, and value. It is close enough to good shopping, great dining, the airport and highways. Rooms are big, clean, and the king bed is superb for a tired traveler. Strongly recommended...

Reviews.Title: “Great choice.......”
Reviews.Author: mylesmom
Reviews.Content: My husband, son 13 and I traveld to Miami a day ahead to board the Norwegian Epic. I picked this hotel because of it's close proximity to the Dolphin Outlet Mall. We arrived at the hotel at 8pm and were checked in immediately. The hotel is clean and inviting. Our room was beautiful! Very nice beds. Lots of room for the 3 of us. My son liked the pull out sofa. The bathroom makes you feel like you are in a spa with nice toiletries provided. The staff is very nice and friendly. We wallked across the parking lot to the PF Chang's and shopping. The Dolphin Mall is huge. My husband said we needed a day just to be able to see all of the mall. It was nicely decorated for the holidays. They even had a live band playing. http://www.shopdolphinmall.com/ If you are a fan of the discount chain Ross, you won't be disappointed with the one at the mall. It has a great selection. There are also other stores such as Coach, Versace, Sony for electronics. The hotel loby has two computers for you to use for free. The lobby also has a beautiful aquarium. We didn't eat there for breakfast as we ate at the mall since it was sooo convenient. Very nice pool with towels provided. Nice fitness room with updated equipment.The only downfall is that there is no shuttle available except within a 5 mile radius around the hotel. You don't need a shuttle to the mall as it is right across the parking lot. It cost us $60. to get to the port the next day and $30 from the airport which is a bit pricey for transportation. Overall, we still don't regret staying at this location. We'd like to go back and visit at another time and stay longer to enjoy the things we missed! Thanks and Happy New Year to all the staff!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel great staff”
Reviews.Author: shayam
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the marriot after a trip to the bahamas to do some xmas shopping. Hotel was very clean and the staff was excellent. Great location in Dolphin Mall carpark. A very special thankQ to Crystal at the front desk who did not hesitate to help us and went out of way to help me drop off my a package to my shippers when fedex did not show up even though things were bust at the front desk. Room staff was was always helpful and fast...will come again....Shayam from Trinidad

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed this hotel :)”
Reviews.Author: Katy S
Reviews.Content: Good Points..... => Shop that sells wine & then opens the bottle for you => concierge that throws teenagers off facebook so you can write tripadvisor reviews about restaurants that have upset your mum (don't go to Historia Romera in Miami Beach... see post " waiter called my mum a liar") => Gazebo next to pool for wine consumption & book reading. Bad Points... => Possible fornication in hot tub (not by anyone from our group) whilst we were reading books, discussing rude waiters and drinking wine form the minimarket...........wouldn't recommend anyone use it without appropriate birth control methods!

Reviews.Title: “miami”
Reviews.Author: kimesha
Reviews.Content: Rooms were spacious, veryneat computer iPod dock flatscreens.It was worth every penny. Fitness room restaurant Jacuzzi n outdoors pool.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: esu3sgt
Reviews.Content: Stayed in November 2011, Nice newly renovated courtyard, Walking distance to mall and all restaurants within. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: “Lots of options”
Reviews.Author: ClauSenTahbaz
Reviews.Content: We stayed on the first floor and it was pretty quiet and comfortable. Right beside the pool and with a little garden outside our window. This property is within walking distance to many restaurants and countless shopping opportunities because it is located in the parking lot of the mall. They also have a shuttle to International mall which is close by.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent option for shopping in Miami”
Reviews.Author: LucioJr
Reviews.Content: This hotel is an excellent option for those who go to Miami for shopping. It's just a few minutes from the Dolphin Mall (the hotel is located at the mall's parking lot), and if you are driving, there are plenty of other shops nearby like Best Buy, Sports Authority, Miami International Mall, Walmart and many restaurants as well. It is just 15 minutes from Miami Int'l Airport. It does offer free wireless internet and the breakfast although expensive ($12.95 per person per day) is very good.

Reviews.Title: “What You Would Expect”
Reviews.Author: RuthieTravels
Reviews.Content: The Courtyard Marriott at the Dolphin Mall in West Miami is what you would traditionally expect from a Marriott chain hotel. The lobby was nicely done, with new features, spacious lounging areas and the breakfast bar. The hotel cleanliness is something of a standard I've come to expect from Marriott and this location was no exception. The hotel was clean inside and out and I had absolutely no complains about its condition. The buffet-style breakfast is standard fare- warm eggs, bacon, sausage, toast, cereal and a variety of fruits, yogurts and Starbucks coffee. Overall a great way to start your day and so conveniently prepped for you. The location of the hotel is strategic on a couple of levels. For starters, the hotel sits on the parking lot of one of Miami's largest shopping malls- The Dolphin Mall. If you anticipate doing any shopping on your trip, this hotel could not be more conveniently situated. The mall proximity also offers you a couple of other benefits, such as a plethora of casual eateries and sit-down restaurants, including TGIFridays, PF Changs and a Brazilian Steak House called Texas de Brazil. If you want to turn a regular night into a fun night, the mall also offers the option of the Cinebistro, which is a movie and dinner experience offering you the option of fine dining and cuisine in a theater setting. This is a fun place for a date night and it is within walking distance of the Courtyard. If you opt not to walk, you can take advantage of one of the many city cabs waiting at the cab lot on the mall parking lot...very convenient if you need to catch a cab back to the hotel. Also, the hotel and the mall sit adjacent to the Florida Turnpike, with easy access to the north and south. Surrounding roads also take you into the heart of Miami in minutes and the airport is a short 15 minute drive away. All in all, this hotel satisfied all the requirements for my stay. It was clean, and the internet was complimentary and speedy...a must in my line of work.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, good price”
Reviews.Author: jpllanos
Reviews.Content: I spend 2 nights here after a business trip to south beach. Of course my only purpose: Shopping! This hotel is very conveniently located right beside the dolphin mall, so you obviously have not to deal with parking place. Rooms and hotel is like in every Marriott brand Hotel well maintained and clean. Not shire if due to my Marriott rewards level I had complimentary internet access or this is offered to everyone but I liked that.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Alternative to Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: summersail
Reviews.Content: We often need a hotel near the airport for a night when connecting to other locations or back home. We generally stay at one of the hotels right at the airport. On a recent trip we didnâ€™t have an early flight, so could stay a little farther out. We opted for the Marriott Courtyard at Dolphin Mall. This was a perfect location since we had a rental car-only about 15 minutes from the airport. Being right at the mall, we could take advantage of movie theatres, restaurants, and shopping. The hotel was clean and quiet, and seemed to be fairly new. The staff was friendly and very helpful. There was no wait to check in or check out. There always seemed to be at least 2 people at the front desk. Wifi in room didnâ€™t have a strong signal, but there was a cable for wired internet and it worked great. We will stay here again when passing through. You know what you get with a Courtyard-and the price was very reasonable at this location.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay”
Reviews.Author: Ken017
Reviews.Content: Checked in on a Friday, checked out on a Monday. Staff was friendly and attentive. Hotel was convenient to where we wanted to go. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location for a shopping trip”
Reviews.Author: Islandgirlep
Reviews.Content: What an ideal location. You can walk from the hotel to Dolphin Mall in 2 minutes, itâ€™s right across the parking lot! And International Mall is also close by, you can walk or drive. Plus you are close to the airport (about a 20 minute drive depending on the time of day). The staff were friendly and helpful, the bed and pillows were comfortable, just what you would expect from a Marriott hotel. There was no safe or mini fridge in my room, which was slightly disappointing, but otherwise everything was great. Iâ€™ll be staying there on my next shopping trip.

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: Jullisa
Reviews.Content: I loved to be so near to the Dolphin Mall. You are on the parking lot of the mall. I felt safe walking to and fro even at night due to the security patrolling (common sense is of course always required). It is easy to catch a taxi also due to its proximity to the mall (lots of taxis there). Staff was nice, rooms clean, all was up to the Marriott standard. They also have a shuttle that can take you to the nearby stores (Best Buy, International Mall etc).

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience All Arounnd”
Reviews.Author: lindatriplets
Reviews.Content: Check in was a breeze. No waiting (there were plenty of people behind the counter) and they accomodated my husband who likes a high floor away from elevators. The room was clean, smelled fresh, had all the amenities expected of a Courtyard. The location was perfect - near the airport but far enough so you don't hear the noise; in the same parking lot as the Dolphin Mall which was great for both food and shopping; and near the turnpike for access to everywhere. There was nothing we didn't like - all excellent!

Reviews.Title: “Terrific hotel, but a little more quantity to go with that quality, please”
Reviews.Author: GringaMamasita
Reviews.Content: My family members and I stayed here for a mixed business/leisure trip. The hotel was fantastic! Very clean, updated rooms. Right next to Dolphin Mall so we could walk over to eat and shop. It was a bit expensive and didn't include ANY breakfast...not even coffee and donuts. For the rate we paid, I would expect at least that. The girls at the front desk were more interested in texting on their cell phones and talking about people behind their backs in Spanish, which I understand, but which they didn't know. Other than that, a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for shopping & airport”
Reviews.Author: dannydodger
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two nights prior to a cruise out of Miami. Upon arriving into MIA after our flight from the UK we hoped in a cab to the hotel - sadly the hotel does not run a shuttle bus service as some others do, it would be nice if they would do this. The hotel is about a 15min drive from the airport, the cab inc a tip was $35, so not cheap but nothing in Miami is! Check-in was smooth and the staff friendly. Our room was located on the top floor as we had requested. The room itsself was of good size, clean with modern fittings, our view was of the parking lot, but also a lake and the Mimai skyline in the distance. The best bit to this hotel is the fact it is located next to the Dolphin mall, its in the parking lot so its only a short walk to the mall where you have a massive choice of shops and places to eat, also a cinema. Its mainly a outlet mall and has all the big name brands, Coach, Tommy Hilfiger, Ralph Lauren, Nike, Addidas etc, so a shoppers paradise. There are lots of choices to eat, we had TGI`s both nights, only due to the fact the wife loves it there! Its very safe to walk around even at night, there is security personel buzzing around on segways day and night. There is a nice pool area at the hotel, we never saw anyone in it, but it was nice to sit by and rest after many hours shopping. If your going on a cruise the hotel will call you a cab, the cost inc tip was $45, and its about 20-25 min ride. This hotel is good value by Miami standards and is perfect for an airport stopover, shopping trip or pre/post crusie stay. We paid around $400 for our 2 nights, which sounds alot but I dont think there is better in Miami for less! We will certainly stay here next time we sail out of Miami!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the hotel the staff couldn't do enough for us”
Reviews.Author: MileeMo
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel, the location is excellent, the staff were extremely friendly and went out of their way to make our stay comfortable. We were part of a large party attending a college seminar and my friend and I were early checking in so we checked into a room that we found was a little inconvenient but were quickly moved the next day (staff even moved our luggage!) and even put milk in the fridge! The manager was brilliant (I think she was the manager - a blond lady from Europe). The location was brilliant I felt safe walking over to the mall. The only downside was that breakfast wasn't included. I will definitely stay at the hotel again and plan to travel to Miami during summer.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for Brief Stay in Miami”
Reviews.Author: Lilsquirrel
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this Marriot pre-cruise, and I chose this hotel based solely on the fact it is on the grounds of a really big outlet mall. This is our 3rd time to Miami, and although far from most things except the mall it's not bad for one night. Our cab right from MIA was $27, which is average for most cab rides in Miami as it's west of the airport. Amazingly it only cost about $35 to the cruise port which is further out near downtown. The front desk was very friendly and accommodating, and the decor was pretty nice for a 3 star hotel. There was a pool outside we noticed, and there's free wifi. The bed was comfortable, and the room was clean. Bathroom was quite adequate. It was nice being able to walk across the parking lot to the mall (Dolphin Mall), and there are many dining options there (great choice of restaurants--I utilized one of those coupon sites and redeemed it at Catch of the Day--great meal for seafood lovers). The only thing missing is perhaps a shuttle service--it would be a nice added bonus. The hotel does have a breakfast buffet, but I think it was $12 additional a person, and we decided to forgo that since we were going on our cruise the next morning. Not bad, but Miami has many hotel options, and I might stay somewhere closer to cruiseport next time considering the lack of affordable transportation options if you don't have a car. Feel free to contact me with any questions.

Reviews.Title: “Great location; if you like to shope”
Reviews.Author: IlanaSue
Reviews.Content: Few things are in this neighborhood, other than a HUGE outlet shopping mall. The center is HUGE and has lots of stores. Unfortunately, the majority of the staff/clerks did not speak English. This is primarily a Spanish speaking neighborhood and we had much difficulty being served in English. The hotel is nice and clean. The staff was VERY accommodating. It offered free internet in both the rooms and the lobby. Breakfast was not included and was VERY expensive. You are best to walk over to the mall across the street to eat.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, friendly and convenient”
Reviews.Author: NataliaSF
Reviews.Content: I really wanted a hotel that was conveniently located and was comfortable, since this was the first time we traveled with our one-year old so I didn't want to spend too much time driving. This was the perfect choice, we were close to most tourist spots we wanted to see but also to the Dolphin Mall. The staff was friendly and on various occasions went out of their way to please us.

Reviews.Title: “Miserable in Miami”
Reviews.Author: KingstonNYC
Reviews.Content: It's a hotel in a parking lot, no security, and one miserable assistant manager! I believe she was French or something, but even with speech barriers you can still use positive body language. It was like I was bothering her when I needed something and then wanted me to "give them a ten" on a servey. On a scale from one being the best and ten beoing the worst, then yes you get a ten. What appeared to be the owner or Hotel Manager was more interested in having his breakfast then standing at the desk asking people how their stay was. Not impressed at all.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: FaithMH
Reviews.Content: I was attending a conference at FIU and stayed here a couple nights. My room was beautiful, very clean, updated and the service was great . No complaints. They have a very nice breakfast bar with an omelet station. Just pack your own bottle of wine because they don't have a bar.The hotel sits at the edge of the Dolphin Mall parking lot so if you want to do some outlet shopping this is the place to stay. It is at least 30 minutes or so from the beach so not a good location if you are looking for fun in the sun.

Reviews.Title: “Even better than before”
Reviews.Author: trinitraveler50
Reviews.Content: This was my third stay at this hotel and my daughter's fourth. This time we brought along the guys (husband and son), and I must say the hotel continues to be one of our favorites. It is very close to the Dolphin Mall so we normally do most of our shopping there. Please bear in mind that Dolphin is an outlet mall, so if you are looking for upscale shopping this is not the place for you. We were also pleasantly surprised on this trip to learn that the Courtyard now has a shuttle service to places within the immediate area e.g. International Mall, Walmart etc.This was of great use to us as it saved on taxi fare. The only down side of our stay, was that for the second time our room overlooked the dumpster, hopefully we will get lucky the next time. All in all we had a good stay. Special thanks to Dianna who shuttled us around. She is a good example of what customer service is about.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel..would definitely recommend”
Reviews.Author: Neesa05
Reviews.Content: Visited Miami for the first time with family members (six of us) we got two rooms (on the fourth floor). I booked on line and upon arrival the reception staff was very helpful, we did not have to wait long to check in. The rooms were very clean, one room had a balcony, a mini fridge, a microwave, additional storage space, the other room was spacious but basic, however, the rooms were always very clean and there was a constant refill of supplies, enough toiletries also the iron and ironing board was a very welcomed addition. Location of the hotel, great for shopping, same compound as dolphin mall and only one minute away from Miami International mall. I have no complaints but I would recommend that breakfast can be complimentary and a shuttle service to and from the airport will be great, because if you plan to shop you don't need to rent a car, due to the close proximity of dolphin and miami international mall and taxis are always outside the hotel. Must also mention the internet connection was strong, my family and i plan to visit again for shopping in Miami and will definitely be staying at the Courtyard.

Reviews.Title: “Everything you need in one place!”
Reviews.Author: Passaro_azul
Reviews.Content: I went to Miami alone to do some shopping and chose this hotel because it was close to the mall. I never expected to be so well treated. They answered all my questions, gave me a high floor room that I have asked for in my Marriott preferences, the staff was very supportive, the room excellent and very clean. They even had a small convenience space close to the reception desk with things you need and forgot to bring or for a small snack. Will return there next month!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Relaxing”
Reviews.Author: NYNonis
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Courtyard and I must say that it was a pleasant experience. The location is great and has a lot of fun things to do around here. The staff was courteous and helpful when I needed directions to a nearby restaurant. The room was clean and elegant. I only stayed one night but overall it was a good experience and I would certainly come back. As someone who travels a great deal for business and pleasure I would recommend this hotel to anyone in this area

Reviews.Title: “Located at the Mall: Shop from open to close & Cinemas and great restaurants!”
Reviews.Author: dexmarg
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in the parking lot of one of Miami's largest mall . It is great for shopping then taking a rest in your relatively new , spacious and comfortable hotel room ! Your choice of paying for breakfast in the hotel or/and after 10am (Sun 11am) trying the popular restaurants located in the mall for lunch/dinner ! Try the Argentina Grill: it's great! , there is also the Burger King and Sparro's and many more in the food court . Pf Changs, Dave & Buster's , TGIF and Buffalo Wild Wings are some notable nightlife hangouts . Take in a big screen at the Cinemas day/night ! Don't forget to SHOP (dolphinmall.com), so many choices and anything you need to get done from hair to nails you can find in the mall : try the massages chairs ooooh!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: joselperon
Reviews.Content: Nice and quiet location, beautiful and well maintained hotel at walking distance to Dolphin Mall (great shopping), free internet and good coffee, near Miami International Mall, free and plenty parking, clean, big and comfortable rooms. Not far from the airport, but far from the beach, what was not an issue to me. It will definitely be my choice for a next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Good old courtyard”
Reviews.Author: staneko
Reviews.Content: Stayed last night at courtyard next to dolphin mall in Miami. Had to do little shopping and meet my business client so this was very convenient. Excellent service, nice and comfy bed and yes, those towels!!! Perfect in every way.

Reviews.Title: “If you only want to shop - this is the place to stay in Miami!!”
Reviews.Author: myoc2001
Reviews.Content: We arranged a stopover at this hotel for two nights, so that we had easy access to the outlet shopping at Dolphin Mall and would thoroughly recommend it, if you only want to shop. The hotel is quite new and the location is fairly close to the Airport. The rooms are spotless and very soundproof, we could not hear any other guests. The beds are very comfortable with plenty of bedding. Good hot showers and nicely appointed bathroom. The staff were very helpful and polite at all times. Buffet breakfast was nice, but there is no restaurant/cafe for lunch or dinner, you have to go over to the mall your other meals. Dolphin Mall is across the car park in very easy walking distance and has a lot of outlet stores ...... we were able to find some great bargains! There is not much else around the hotel so if you don't like shopping don't stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Esquimalt
Reviews.Content: Booked on basis of previous TripAdvisor reviews. One night upon arrival in MIami before heading to Key West. As previously reviewed, we found this to be a very clean and comfortable hotel with excellent staff. Although breakfast was not included in our rate, the a la cart and buffet selections were very good and reasonably priced. The hotel is well situated for shopping at the Dolphin Mall, which I understand to be one of the largest malls in Florida, or for a first night on arrival at MIA, but it probably wouldn't be convenient as a base for touring Miami and Miami Beach. Highly recommended if the location is suitable for your needs. We arrived late in the evening, about 10:00 pm, but were able to have a very nice light dinner at the Italian restaurant in the mall.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: zippy37
Reviews.Content: Great hotel a step away from the Dolphin Mall. Staff was incredible. Very very clean. Nice room and comfortable bed. Price was $159 per night and well worth it. Breakfast buffet had everything you would expect plus super service from staff. Nice pool and hot tub. I highly recommend !

Reviews.Title: “Miami all the way!”
Reviews.Author: TracyM2
Reviews.Content: 10 stars all the way.....it was close by some of the best restraunts and only blocks away from my MOST FAVORITE eatery...TUNAS....people there were very nice and the atmosphere was most pleasent! i plan on going back...(and sometime soon)

Reviews.Title: “A Comfort Inn or Best Western type hotel but located to a Mall”
Reviews.Author: dulong3a
Reviews.Content: The first impression to me was 'dry". I felt itch after sit on sofa and had no very good sleep when I woke up in the second morning. Towel in bathroom and sheets on bed were so â€œusedâ€�. It has no my familiar Marriot or Courtyardâ€™s good smell. They also charge for full breakfast. Front desk people were friendly and tried they best. Location is convenient to the people who ready for shopping but donâ€™t count the word â€œquiteâ€� inside or outside. Parking is big problem during Christmas time since they are close to the mall. Shops in mall are so so â€“ not much upscale store or unique stores.

Reviews.Title: “Shopping trip”
Reviews.Author: Lyndy123London
Reviews.Content: The hotel was situated both near the airport and the shopping mall. However, after spending a quiet week's holiday in Jamaica with a view to some quick christmas shopping on the way home back to London, Miami was a wake up call. It was loud, noisy and very busy with people partying and shopping. The hotel was very comfortable and peacful haven. Clean tidy and wonderful kingsize bed. With free coffee down in the lobby, which you needed as the coffee machine in the bedroom was not really worth using. Bathroom was clean and tidy. Staff were helpful and friendly. We never ate in the hotel. But they did have a shop and stay offer that we used to eat in one of the local restaurants, the food was good. On the whole, we went there for a quick shopping trip on our way back to London from Jamaica, so it fitted the bill.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the money”
Reviews.Author: Klaus1024
Reviews.Content: Close to Dolphin Mall, great location for shoping, to the beach in about 20 minutes, easy to reach from the airport. The hotel seems to be quite new. Staff is very helpful and friendly. Breakfast can by bought for 12,95$ - reasonable price for good quality and perfect service. Rooms (some minor topics): fridge and safe are missing. All in all quite nice stay. Would definetely come back again.

Reviews.Title: “value for money accomodation”
Reviews.Author: gmk30
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this location for ease of access to the Dolphin Mall plus the freeway and airport. Ample car parking available. Friendly helpful staff. Well appointed room. Breakfast available to purchase adjacent to lobby area. Free internet access in lobby. Swimming pool and hot tub at rear. Fitness room. Free coffee available in lobby. A handy location if you are travelling back to Miami airport and need overnight accomodation.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect place !”
Reviews.Author: Sarahvigoth
Reviews.Content: A great place with a very sympathic staff, clean, good rooms. Close to 2 huge mall it's the perfect place to spend few days for shopping. Everything was perfect !!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: happyfriday
Reviews.Content: I found the Dolphin Marriott to be a great hotel. The employees at the front desk were exceptionally friendly, helpful and efficient. The room was realy big and spotlessly clean and the breakfast was also very good. It obviously isn't a five star hotel but I think you'd struggle to find a better hotel at this price near the airport. I only stayed at the Marriott for one night and used it as an airport stop-over. It is only about fifteen minutes away and a great way to do some shopping as it is only five minutes away from Dolphin mall. I would definately stay at the hotel again. I only wish that other Marriott's I'd stayed in were as well run as this one!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: memberCuracao
Reviews.Content: For the shopping fanatics this is the perfect place to stay. Within walking distance from the Dolphin mall and just 5$ away from international mall. Now about the hotel itself it's a nice, clean place to stay. The frontdesk staff was great. They make you feel at ease. I would defenitely recommend this hotel to everybody.

Reviews.Title: “great location-reasonable price- very clean”
Reviews.Author: manolitomieldeabjea
Reviews.Content: This hotel has a great location- close to shopping malls, golf courses, and great restaurants- 10 min from the airport- very clean and spacious

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: nuviBlumenau
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Marriot propertie last april and loved it. It seemed new, your wide rooms are comfortable and the location is good. I recomend.

Reviews.Title: “What a find”
Reviews.Author: BeachLover341
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this place. Front staff was incredibly friendly and very helpful. Rooms are a little small but very clean and fresh. I would not hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good location to the airport, great shopping next door”
Reviews.Author: MonanMatt
Reviews.Content: we only stayed for one night, the room was comfortable, the only thing it lacked was a fridge. The shopping next door was great, it was the cheapest we found during our trip to the USA. Especially the Disney Outlet, as we visited 4 this one was the cheapest. The Lindt chocolate outlet was great too, excellent value and free taste testing. The foodcourt had good variety. We hired a car and drove out to Miami beach which was beautiful.Its good to hire a car because you dont just see the tourist sights. The staff were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Staff makes the place....”
Reviews.Author: dcfargo
Reviews.Content: Check in was a breeze last night as we arrived into Miami past 11 with 3 small children and grandparents in tow. We were in our rooms within minutes. Still a bit worked up from the trip, we had a couple beers purchased from the small market they have at front desk. $3.50 a beer not bad at all. The rooms are clean, quiet and what is expected. As i sit and write this on Saturday morning in the comfortable lounge downstairs, I am happy to report that the staff is making this place. They are full of laughs, full of chatter and seem to get along wtih each other very well. As you can guess, this is a good thing. I just watched a woman from the breakfast area chat up to elderly women in the lobby. She had a true interest in them as they discussed the thunderstorms that went by last night. I think she made their day. Free wireless internet too:) Good place...great staff. P.S. Not a mall guy but it looks like the Dolphin Mall right next door is a good one.

Reviews.Title: “My new favourite Miami Hotel - cannot recommend highly enough”
Reviews.Author: TomCayman
Reviews.Content: As regulars to the Cayman Tripadvisor page know, I am a frequent poster there and the original Cayman Islands Destination Expert. As the Resort Director for theReef Resort in Cayman, I also have to a) go through Miami almost every time I travel, and b) marketing and other business means this is often. Also, as living in the islands means that we almost always have to shop when we travel, I frequently spend a night or two at a "home base" hotel close to freeways, malls and the airport when in Miami. The Courtyard Dolphin Mall could not be better located for the mall (in the parking lot of Dolphin Mall!), and that is, of course, a great location relative to freeways and the airport. Now, it's a Courtyard hotel, so why the glowing review ? after all, what is so special ? If it simply did what it promised, that would be enough, as the Courtyard concept is just about ideal for what I need when I travel (I would note that I never stop for breakfast or use the lobby area or computers, so can't comment on that). What is has extra is a little extra "feel" of good service. Have stayed their several times in the last few months, and always (always, always) found a) the front desk staff to be 110% warm, welcoming and friendly, and b) the rooms to be impeccably maintained. As someone in the hotel business who is totally focussed on staff motivation, training and leadership as the secret to exemplary customer service, I could tell that the staff enjoy working there. Now, after my last stay, the automated post stay email led me to respond that I found the inroom wifi painfully slow. Not expecting any response, instead I got a detailed, personal, positive and highly constructive email from the General Manager. In short, that communique was first class, and it is that kind of quality leadership that tends to be reflected in motivated and high performing staff throughout a hotel. Kudos indeed :)

Reviews.Title: “Would stay there again in a heartbeat”
Reviews.Author: Travelgirl1999
Reviews.Content: This hotel is rather new and the atmosphere is very nice. It is close to great shopping locations (Dolphin Mall and International Mall) and close to major highways. It is very easy to get to and from the airport - just of the Dolphin Expressway. The staff at the hotel is very helpful and courteous ... they always greet you with a smile and have a can-do attitude ... to find restaurants, give out information about the malls, sightseeing attractions, or directions. The breakfast was great, especially the made to order omeletts. I would stay there again whenever I am back in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Great construction and amenities but sad service”
Reviews.Author: vladoauliru01
Reviews.Content: The hotel was good, in front of a good mall, which had relatively good prices and a lot of brand stores, saddly the people at the front desk wasn't nice and it seemed that they thought that latin people doesn't have enough money to stay there. Is sad to say it but the people that works there make the place worth less than it should

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: P0ul
Reviews.Content: Found this hotel by chance. The hotel is rather new, situated at the Dolphin Mall parking lot but remote. Short distance to teh Dolphin Parkway, so it takes only 15 minutes to central Miami and 10 minutes to the airport. Nice and clean room, nice pool. The breakfast team is really the best you can think of. The front desk staff could very nice too. If you need a good bargain and do not have to stay directly in central Miami or Miami Beach - then choose this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A+ Service”
Reviews.Author: TexasEchotech
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel impressed us each of the 9 days we stayed here. Hotel rooms are so similiar now in these big chains that service is what I look for and the people made all the difference in the world. Thank You for a great time!!!

Reviews.Title: “loved the location !! within walking distance to mall”
Reviews.Author: abcdeJuneau
Reviews.Content: I loved this hotel. It was right near the dolphin mall. We checked in at 9:30 am the front desk was able to get us into a room even though check in time was supposed to be much later. didn't see restraunt on site but did have a place to buy snacks, salad and beer, there was something offered for breakfast but we opted not to eat there. Room was great and would go back to this hotel again. Only downside was that they don't have a shuttle to hotel and cab ride was $30 dollars from miami airport. It is within walking distance of mall and felt very safe each time we went back and forth there was security car present.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING do not miss!”
Reviews.Author: Ninn4
Reviews.Content: Hidden gem alert Do you like new hotels, readily available shopping and dinning and great service? If yes then do not miss this hotel. I was shocked and decided I would tell everyone I could about how great this property is. We booked it on an overnight on our way and from our destination. Yes it is in the mall parking lot but it actually is a great location. After the mall is closed you have great access to super restaurants and entertainment. What else could you ask for, It is 15 mins from the airport which cost us between 25 and 32 US. Down the street is the International mall which is more traditional and has the anchor stores you are used to. The mall deals were great! enough said. The hotel itself was clean, tidy and beautiful! Furnishings were nice and a step above what you expect from a courtyard. The bathrooms were great, nicely finished and roomy. The pool was clean and ready. The restaurant was clean and ready for business. Front desk staff were the best I have met. They had information and were accommodating. I forgot toothpaste, no problem, I wanted to know where something was, no problem. Can't say enough about them! Breakfast att he hotel, don't miss it. They make your eggs how you like them with traditional breakfast items. Fresh orange juice-yum! Don't miss this hotel, it is great although the location may not be for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “The Staff make this place”
Reviews.Author: Pete2306
Reviews.Content: A hotel at a shopping mall? It sounds like my idea of pure hell, but no! The staff are SO helpful and friendly that you soon realise that actually the location enhances the experience. Dolphin Mall has some decent eateries, and the pitchers of Mojito at "Mojitos" are a welcome worth waiting for after a 10 hour flight, 1.5 hour immegration queue and 1 hour wait for a rental car (don't book with Dollar!). As for the hotel itself, well - the rooms are a decent size, the bed is comfy, the little "kiosk" shop at the reception is good for all those little items you need like snacks, beverages and beer etc., the pool looked compact but good enough for a refresher - if you have the time between shopping and eating - and the best bit . . you don't have to travel into the over rated and egotistical "hole" that is South Beach to start your vacation! A great place for that "pre-vacation" shopping time . .

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Little Courtyard next to the Mall”
Reviews.Author: ctsblue
Reviews.Content: I recentley stayed at this Hotel because my Company recommended it. After a red-eye flight from the west coast I was just so happy to reach my destination. I got to the Hotel early and received a very warm welcome. I was just going to ask if I could store my luggage till later and go to work and the girls at the front desk gave me an early check-in. I am so used to "check-in time is 3pm", It was a nice surprise. Got upstairs to my room and it looked great, smelled new and was super clean. I took a shower in their beautiful bathroom and headed to work. When I returned I asked where I should go for dinner. They gave me a list of Restaurants and an Italian place that delivers right to your Hotel room(used them later in the week). The Sales Manager / Director was there and she was so sweet. She went to her office and came back with a discount booklet full of deals for the Dolphin Mall. They were all so great. The breakfast servers were SUPER. The High Speed Internet was good and FREE. You really feel welcomed at this Hotel and that is great being away from home. I can't wait to return! The only thing that I didn't like is there is not a shuttle to and from the Airport. The taxi was $30.00 each way.

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: Lumihiutale
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights in the Courtyard Marriott Dolphin Mall, booked through hotel's own website. Main purpose of the stay was to have a decent place to sleep and relax between flights - no needs for entertainment, pool, restaurant services, etc. but definitely for clean, secure, quiet, comfortable room. This hotel met our expectations very well. As the entire hotel is non-smoking, this was a big plus for us. Our room had 2 queen beds, very comfortable, selection of pillows ready in the room. Plenty of closet space, desk for working, small living area with chairs and table, one corner equipped with coffee making facilities. Bathroom had shower and bathtub combination. The room had a balcony overlooking to the Dolphin Mall / parking area, parking in front of the hotel was free. Everything in the room and in the hotel was clean and well maintained. Complimentary wireless internet connection in the room was good and worked without problems. Self-service laundry and dryer were available: 1$ per use, worked perfectly. Breakfast buffet in the lobby restaurant offered good variety of items, fresh and nicely presented. However, as noted by previous reviewer, there was wide gap between the skills of the egg station ladies: first day was just perfect with great service, second day was only fair with minimum service. Breakfast was not included into the room rate, but was reasonably priced. Service in the hotel/reception was very good. Our luggage did not arrive with us and the hotel provided dental kit, deodorant and razor kit - immediately and free of charge. During our stay all our questions were promptly responded and all the staff were polite with us. What should be noted is that there is no fridge or microwave nor safe in the room. However, safety deposit box is provided in the reception (free of charge), and it is easy to access any time. However, only a couple of boxes are big enough for laptop computers. If you need a room in quiet location, request it - noise from the hallway comes through the door.

Reviews.Title: “good enough”
Reviews.Author: dlareme
Reviews.Content: Convient hotel, Courtyard standards but Undertrained staff. Few teething problems, like no dressing mirror -can you believe that.The only mirror is in the bathroom above the sink. the toilet didn't flush properly. the B/fast too pricy and the omlette lady is not on top of things. Must mention 2 front desk staff. Denise and a lady from PR. Very warm and welcoming ladies. When the shift changed the other ladies were not very helpful. All in all i will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, great staff & awesome location”
Reviews.Author: DiveSuze
Reviews.Content: This was the second time I've stayed in this hotel in a month and both times were fantastic. The hotel is very clean, the rooms are very nicely decorated with really comfy beds, flat screen TVs, and good quality sheets and towels. Very good value for money. The staff were super friendly and couldn't do more to help - especially the waiting staff at breakfast, and at check-in. I chose this hotel for it's proximity to the airport and for it's location at the Dolphin Mall as I was only in the States for one night. A taxi from the airport will cost you just under $30 but I found a taxi willing to take me to the airport for a flat rate of $20. There's also a return shuttle bus between the airport and mall which is $10 for a return ticket, but it only goes every couple of hours. Will definately be staying here in future!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Ainkelev
Reviews.Content: A lot of my travel takes me to Miami. I've stayed in a lot of places in the past several years. This Courtyard has a great location (a few minutes from all major expressways); close to the airport (10-15 minutes); great shopping (next to a huge Mall); and best of all - it is brand new. The staff will give you an available room where you want (just ask them) and they cater to your every need. I caught one of my kids getting directions to the zoo from the desk staff (by the way, it is 15 minutes away). There were always newspapers (at your door in the morning, too), coffee and internet access (in your room free, too) in the lobby. Will stay there again (and again)

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, Great service”
Reviews.Author: roloh12
Reviews.Content: I would not normally even think of writing a review, but this place was by far the nicest hotel I have stayed at in the Miami area. Usually I have not been impressed by the customer service down in the South Florida area, but these folks treated me and my 2 co-workers like royalty. The staff helped us without our asking, were polite, courtious and friendly. The hotel is new and modern, extreemely clean, and surrounded by great shops and places to eat. They have earned my business again anytime I am in the area.

HotelInfo.Name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami at Dolphin Mall
HotelInfo.Address: 11275 Northwest 12th Street, Miami, FL 33172
